author: Matt Novak
title: Trump Appears to Go TACO on Rumors He’ll Fire Fed Chair Jerome Powell
description: The president said it was 'highly unlikely' but didn't rule it out.
content: Reports leaked Wednesday that President Donald Trump was getting ready to fire the chairman of the Federal Reserve, Jerome Powell. The news caused markets to dip, but TACO, the popular Wall Street ac… [+5475 chars]
